channel.title: Resources on Learn to Code Grand Rapids
channel.description: Recent content in Resources on Learn to Code Grand Rapids

item.title: Resources
item.description:
Beginner

These resources for people who are justing starting their learning to code journey.

Videos

  • C# Fundamentals for Absolute Beginners - If you are just getting started and C# is your first language we strongly recommend you watch this video series.

Practice Problems

  • Simple Programming Problems - These programming problems are designed for people who are just getting started, and get progressively more difficult at you advance.

  • Project Euler

Training Programs

  • freeCodeCamp - Learn web development using JavaScript.
